name: Silent Crabwalk
description:
This game was made in under 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2018
The theme was "GENRE, but you can't MECHANIC".
This game is a Rhythm-based game without a constant, audible beat.

There is a beat to time you in while you are near the buoy at the start of 
each level but as you move away you must count the beat yourself.
Time your clicks to move the crab to its home.
Try to do this as fast as possible.

Moving towards the water will hurt you.
You'll have to restart the level if you run out of lives.

The game is coded in python using the pygame module. Sound effects were made using SFXR by DrPetter. Images made using Aseprite

- Charlton Lane
